channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Blog 1
item.description: This week, I looked at the Republican/Democrat voteshare margin of House congressional elections. I analyzed the 2018 and 2014 congressional elections. # Plot of 2018 voteshare margin plot_usmap(data = house2018, regions = "states", values = "Votemargin", labels = TRUE) + scale_fill_gradient2(low = "skyblue3", mid = "white", high = "firebrick3", name = "Two-party Voteshare Margin") + labs(title = "2018 Two-Party Voteshare Margin") + theme_void() # Graph ggplot() + geom_sf(data = simplified_cd114, mapping = aes(fill = voteshare_margin)) + scale_fill_gradient2(low = "skyblue3", mid = "white", high = "firebrick3", name = "Two-Party \nVoteshare Margin") + theme_void() + labs(title = "Two-Party Vote-Share Margin by District", subtitle = "2014 Midterm Election")

item.title: Blog 1 - Analysis
item.description: This week, I looked at the Republican/Democrat voteshare margin of House congressional elections. I analyzed the 2018 and 2014 congressional elections.
